The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them is solely related to an unseen and ancient race: The half-African/Bone-eating creatures that can only be found in the desert.
Sound effects were well-done, with good ambiance during the chase scenes to make some immensely nerve-wracking sequences even more so

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless action film. In Canada stopping for fuel, Joe goes to the Palace Petula beauty pageant final. There, he meets Miss Anchorage and loves her at first sight. But she soon disappears in thin air with a Peeping Tom beside a water tower.
